subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Tom Watson and Andy North combined for a better-ball 62 at the Legends of Golf in Savannah, Ga., for a four-stroke lead heading into the final round of the Champions Tour event.
snippet: Tom Watson and Andy North combined for a better-ball 62 at the Legends of Golf in Savannah, Ga., for a four-stroke lead heading into the final round of the Champions Tour event.
